front.title: Design Discussion of Route Leaks Solution Methods

author.organization: USA National Institute of Standards and Technology

abstract.t: This document captures the design rationale of the route leaks solution document (see draft-ietf-idr-route-leak-detection- mitigation, draft-ietf-grow-route-leak-detection-mitigation). The designers needed to balance many competing factors, and this document provides insights into the design questions and their resolution.
